inclusion.criterion: nodules which underwent head and neck ultrasound(US) examination and US-FNA cytology from
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 2007 July to 2010 Dec at Department of Otolaryngology, Far Eastern Memorial Hospital,
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: a previous diagnosis of thyroid malignancy before US exam
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer with history of XRT and RAI ablation, but also had nodules examined via head and neck ultrasound(US) examination and US-FNA cytology from 2007 July to 2010 Dec at Department of Otolaryngology, Far Eastern Memorial Hospital, Taipei, Taiwan. However, patient has a previous diagnosis of thyroid malignancy before US exam which may trigger exclusion.
